amendment.description: Amendment provides that none of the funds provided for the Justice Department may be used to prohibit states from participating in voluntary child safety gun lock programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 20 printed in the Congressional Record to provide that none of the funds provided for the Justice Department may be used to prohibit states from participating in voluntary child safety gun lock programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
